name: Astro Mania
description:
A simple game about astronauts shooting each other in space. Use A to fire and left stick to aim. Fight your friends to be the last one drifting!

You do not move by conventional means. Instead, take advantage of the distinct lack of space air and push yourself along by shooting!

You cannot aim and shoot at the same time. You must release the fire button before changing direction.

A gamepad is required to play this game.

Credit to myself for code and sound design; Derran DeL Luck for music, sound, and art; Zachary Hollomon and Anna Evans for art; Ethan Cox for tech support; and Jonathan Word for playtesting.
